DESCRIPTION: Set the mod/admin roles for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setstaff admin [@Role]** ~ Sets the admin role. If this role is already set as the admin role, it will reset the admin role.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setstaff mod [@Role]** ~ Adds/Removes a role from the servers mod roles.
ALIASES: Setstaff does not have any aliases
INVALID_ROLE: You did not provide a valid role to use.
ADMINROLE_RESET: The admin role has been removed. You  no longer have any role set as the admin role on this server.
ADMINROLE_SET: The admin role has been set. Anyone with this role will have all permissions to manage the bot for your server.
MODROLE_REMOVED: The role has been removed from the servers mod roles.
MODROLE_ADDED: The role has been added to the servers mod roles.
